## TileId type

A string that represents a specific colored bug tile.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TileId = `${Color}${BugId}`;
```
**References:** [Color](./hive-lib.color.md)<!-- -->, [BugId](./hive-lib.bugid.md)
